Home.permissionlessProtocol: The permissionless protocol {users} people are using to win by saving
Home.depositCardDescription: Deposit for a chance to win
Home.provenTool: Prize savings are a proven tool to help people save money and avoid wealth destroying lotteries.
Home.organicUsage: PoolTogether unlocks organic usage for wallets & blockchains
Home.automationTransparency: Protocols automate services according to unchangeable rules. This makes prize savings more transparent, fair and accessible.

Help.prizeLinkedSavings: PoolTogether is an open source protocol for <teal>Prize Linked Savings</teal>.
Help.learnAbout: This page can help you learn about the protocol, how it works and how to use it.
Help.aboutCardDescription: Learn the basics of what PoolTogether is and how it works.
Help.gettingStartedCardDescription: Learn how to deposit to and withdraw from PoolTogether on multiple different blockchains.
Help.faqCardDescription: Get quick answers to the most common questions about the PoolTogether protocol.
Help.guidesCardDescription: Get detailed instructions on using open source PoolTogether extensions and tooling.
Help.discordCardDescription: Chat with us on our Discord server to get help or answers to your questions.

Ecosystem.checkOut: Check out tools and extensions for the PoolTogether protocol
Ecosystem.ptApp_v4CardDescription: An interface for the V4 PoolTogether protocol.
Ecosystem.poolExplorerCardDescription: An alternative community-run interface for the V4 PoolTogether protocol.
Ecosystem.depositDelegatorCardDescription: Delegate your chances to win without losing custody of your deposit.
Ecosystem.tallyCardDescription: Create and vote on proposals that control PoolTogether's treasury.
Ecosystem.treasuryCardDescription: A summary of the assets currently in PoolTogether's community-run treasury.
Ecosystem.dune_v4CardDescription: A Dune analytics dashboard to visualize onchain data about the V4 PoolTogether protocol.
Ecosystem.prizeCalcCardDescription: A calculator for viewing potential outcomes from delegations.

Community.activeCommunity: Learn about the active community around PoolTogether
Community.otherPlatforms: You can also find us on these platforms:
Community.chatCardDescription: Join us on our Discord server, the heart of our online community.
Community.forumsCardDescription: Get up to date with the current governance debates or share an idea to improve the protocol.
Community.votingCardDescription: Vote with your POOL tokens using Tally's interface to our governance contract.
Community.grantsCardDescription: Learn about the grants process, apply for one or see recently funded grants.
Community.calendarCardDescription: Follow the community calendar for invites to various PoolTogether events.

Builders.joinUs: Join the diverse community of developers and designers building on the protocol
Builders.clientJs_v4CardDescription: Simple JS library to interact with PoolTogether V4 contracts.
Builders.clientJsCardDescription: Simple JS library to interact with PoolTogether Hyperstructure contracts.
Builders.prizeTierControllerCardDescription: View and edit upcoming prize tiers.
Builders.brandKitCardDescription: A collection of assets, logos and styles for building the PoolTogether brand.
